14.content:
*knock knock* that must be your girlfriend christine coming home from work.

'hey honey did you forget your key?' you open the door expecting to see your short, chubby girlfriend but instead you find yourself staring at a pair of big tits in a tight black shirt revealing lots of cleavage. you allow your eyes to roam upwards and see the tits belong to malorie, christine's best friend from work. and poking her head over mallorie's shoulder you see her little flunky fiona. mallory is big and tall, with great tits and a nice ass, like christine and fiona she has a kind of punk style often wearing tight jeans and sneakers with slutty tops and lots of studded accessories.

'oh.. what are you two doing here?' you've never really gotten along with christine's friends. they always seem to be egging her on to some new self destructive act...

'christine told us that you told her that we're bad influences' mallory says glaring at you. both she and fiona have died their hair red recently. mallory wears it long and parted while fiona's hair is shorter and spiky.

'yeah bad influences' fiona chimes in snarkily. malorie seems angry and fiona as usual is following her lead...

'listen i just...' you start to answer but mallorie interrupts you

'oh we know. we know what you meant. and we wanted to apologize' she smiles at you innocently but you can see fiona smirking at you from over mallorie's shoulder...

'apologize?'

'yeah apologize. we're really sorry hehehehehe' fiona says giggling. clearly insincere...

'yeah really sorry you can't handle some competition. really sorry you're stifling christine. and really sorry it's time for you to SHRINK!' malorie speaks louder with each word until she's finally yells the last word. you think for a second she's going to slap you but suddenly your vision unfocuses and you lose track of what she's doing...

'yeah SHRINK!' fiona chimes in again and you look up to see her smirking down at you... wait? UP? you're shrinking!

how small do you get?

info.brief_description: several interactive giantess stories to choose from. based around different girls.
info.description:
several interactive giantess stories to choose from. based around different girls.

i will be updating the chapters periodically. so if they seem really sparse and basic; don't worry they're just outlines for now and will be filled in later with more detail.

i do really appreciate reviews and gift points if anyone likes (or dislikes) what hey see. i'm hoping to get enough GP to buy a membership so i can make some more inter actives...

feel free to add your own chapters as well guys :)
